title: Awesome boutique hotel is a nice change of pace from intl. business hotels
text: Traditional styled boutique hotel located in a hutong district in Beijing. The rooms are moderately sized, well kept, and have basic amenities. The staff are wonderful, and will go out of their way to make your stay in Beijing perfect - I was in Beijing on business but had a day of free time - they helped me book a bus tour to see the Great Wall, and they offer activities such as dumpling making and shadow puppet painting. Make sure you watch the shadow puppet performance in the evening - it's held in the main hall of the hotel, and draws a large crowd.
